30: dialog snowman What are you doing here? You're trespassing!
dialog tux The reign of the Snow King is over!
dialog snowman What are you talking about? His reign has only just begun!
dialog tux Yeah, and now it's going to end! He should have thought about that before taking away MY fish!
dialog snowman Fish?! I will not allow you to overthrow the great king over a tax! Your conquest ends here!
